statements: SELECT name, qualifications FROM Instructors;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_id, name FROM Instructors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE qualifications LIKE '%PhD%';
SELECT COUNT(instructor_id) AS total_instructors FROM Instructors;
SELECT name, qualifications FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT instructor_id, name FROM Instructors WHERE qualifications IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id IN (2, 3, 5)
SELECT DISTINCT name, qualifications FROM Instructors WHERE name <> 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT full_name, qualification FROM instructors;
SELECT full_name FROM instructors WHERE qualification = 'PhD';
SELECT course_name, full_name FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE course_id > 5 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, qualification FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor_id IN (SELECT instructor_id FROM instructors WHERE qualification = 'PhD');
SELECT course_name AS 'Course Name', full_name AS 'Instructor Name' FROM courses INNER JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Database%' AND instructor_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT name, email FROM Instructors WHERE title='Professor';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Qualifications WHERE date_obtained >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT instructor_id, COUNT(id) AS qualification_count FROM Qualifications GROUP BY instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM Instructors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Instructors WHERE title = 'Professor';
SELECT * FROM Qualifications WHERE qualification_type = 'PhD' ORDER BY date_obtained DESC;
SELECT Courses.course_name, Instructors.name FROM Courses JOIN Instructors ON Courses.instructor_id = Instructors.id;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE name LIKE '%e%';
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT name, email, qualification FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM InstructorCourses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT qualification_name, name FROM Qualifications INNER JOIN Instructors ON Qualifications.instructor_id = Instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT name, email FROM Instructors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT name, qualification_name FROM Instructors JOIN Qualifications ON Instructors.instructor_id = Qualifications.instructor_id;

SELECT name AS instructor_name, course_name, course_description FROM Instructors JOIN InstructorCourses ON Instructors.instructor_id = InstructorCourses.instructor_id JOIN Courses ON InstructorCourses.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY InstructorCourses.instructor_id ASC, Courses.course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT Name, Specialty FROM Instructors;
SELECT Course_ID, Course_Name, Course_Description FROM Courses;
SELECT Qualification_Name, Description FROM Qualifications;
SELECT Location FROM Offices;
SELECT * FROM Instructors
SELECT Course_Name, Course_Description FROM Courses
SELECT Name, Specialty FROM Instructors WHERE Specialty='Mathematics'
SELECT Location, COUNT(*) FROM Offices GROUP BY Location
SELECT * FROM Assignments ORDER BY Assignment_ID DESC LIMIT 5
